sources.note: Main landing page. Describes Aarista as technology-powered post-acute platform, highlights AI/ML capabilities, integrations with major EHR vendors, and key metrics (70k+ patients, 14 states).
ONC compliance page. Lists ONC certification via Drummond Group, SOC 2 attestation, links to EHI export documentation. Describes company as physician-led, based in Bellingham, WA.

Detailed feature list. Covers clinical alerts, remote monitoring, smart scheduler, e-prescribing, e-faxing, EHR integration (PCC, MatrixCare, Epic, Cerner, etc.), practice management, specialty templates, revenue cycle management, and Aarista Academy.
Solution overview page. Describes EHR, telehealth, data analytics, and patient engagement modules. Emphasizes bringing inpatient standard of care to outpatient/post-acute settings.

Provider app FAQ. Mobile app for iOS/Android with access to patient profiles, schedules, health records, clinical notes, medications, lab results. Voice documentation (Smart Scribe) feature. QR code patient registration.

August 2024 investment announcement. HCAP Partners leads investment. Aarista serves 70,000+ patients across 14 states in long-term care, skilled nursing, and assisted living. Real-time data from 200+ sources.
HCAP Partners portfolio page. Confirms Aarista as Fund V investment, describes as only Digital Health Platform using real-time patient data from 200+ sources with AI/ML.

Altea Healthcare homepage. Describes itself as leading provider of technology solutions and provider services for post-acute care. EHI export PDF hosted here. Connection to Aarista confirmed via shared CTO (Michael Mai).
Altea Healthcare product page. Describes 'Connected Model' but limited detail. No explicit mention of Aarista on the page.
Confirms Michael Mai (Aarista developer contact) is CTO at Altea Healthcare, establishing the link between Aarista Technology LLC and Altea Healthcare.
Aarista Provider App on Apple App Store. Found via search results, confirms mobile app existence.
